definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Does it make the diaphragm sound (move) different?
Which shaketh the earth out of her place, and the pillars thereof tremble.
sentences.chinese: 他使地震動，離其本位，地的柱子就搖撼。

sentences.english: Stay in the car until the shaking stops.
sentences.chinese: 直到震動結束前呆在車裏。

sentences.english: It's not easy to count the number of vibrations of shale shaker.
sentences.chinese: 要數清震動篩的振盪數是不容易的。

sentences.english: Weighing mechanism shall be temperature compensating and shall have automatic dampener to reduce oscillations.
sentences.chinese: 稱重的機械裝置應有溫度修正和自動潤滑以減少震動。

sentences.english: Raise the voltage and the bar vibrates faster.
sentences.chinese: 提高電壓，硅條震動加快。

sentences.english: These incidents haven shaken me to the core.
sentences.chinese: 這事曾深深地震動過我。

sentences.english: Feeding paper stable by Vibratory Motor.
sentences.chinese: 震動電機驅動送紙，輸紙平穩。

sentences.english: Stay indoors until the shaking stops and you're sure it's safe to exit.
sentences.chinese: 直到震動停止前呆在室內，確定安全後再逃出。

sentences.english: I liked the vibrations it sent into my skull.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡它令我頭顱一塊震動的感覺。

sentences.english: Anti-vibration structure, strong stability at much vibration work field.
sentences.chinese: 採用耐震強化結構，在震動大的現場動作也非常穩定。

sentences.english: The ground-shaking is measured by ground acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 地面的震動可通過地面加速度來測量。

sentences.english: Japan Airlines Bankruptcy shake the global aviation industry will be in Japan tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 日航破產震動全球航空業將是日本的明天？

sentences.english: When you shake brick, the mortar in between dissolves.
sentences.chinese: 當震動磚塊的時候，夾在其中的砂漿就溶解了。

sentences.english: If you say the word "this" correctly, you should feel vibrations on your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 如果念得正確，應該可以感覺到舌頭的輕微震動。

sentences.english: The new federal research ships also have more expensive engines that reduce vibration.
sentences.chinese: 新的聯邦調查船也有較昂貴的引擎，以減少震動。

definition: to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to affect/to produce a change in sth
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
